title: GOODY BOXX™
summary: GOODY BOXX™ is an e-commerce shop for personalized favors and curated candy mixes. Working closely with the brand as the sole developer, the site was built from the ground up to support customizable products with file uploads, personalized text, and custom candy combinations. Shipping, taxes, sales gateways, inventory, product variants, and automated workflows for building the boxes were also incorporated for the brand.
